text: Lucinda Kate Riley (; 16 February 1965 – 11 June 2021) was a Northern Irish writer and actress. She was born in County Down, Northern Ireland. She was known for her roles in The Story of the Treasure Seekers (1982), Auf Wiedersehen, Pet (1983) and Jumping the Queue (1989). Riley died on June 11, 2021 in Lisburn, Northern Ireland from cancer at the age of 55.Lucinda Riley er død ==References== ==Other websites== * Official site * Category:1965 births Category:2021 deaths Category:British movie actors Category:Writers from Northern Ireland Category:British television actors Category:People from County Down
title: Lucinda Riley
